document.docAuthor: Cipola, Nikolas Gioia & Bellini, Bruno Cavalcante
document.masterDocTitle: A new cave species of Coecobrya Yosii (Collembola, Entomobryidae, Entomobryinae) from South Africa, with an identification key to the genus

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A new cave species of Coecobrya Yosii (Collembola, Entomobryidae, Entomobryinae) from South Africa, with an identification key to the genus

- Mucronal basal spine very short, not reaching the apex of apical tooth ( Fig 45 ); USA.............

*

C. maritima Park, 2004
16(14) Outer tooth on unguiculus at most slightly broader than unguiculus itself.........................................17

C. papuana ( Yosii, 1971 )
*
